name: MLRecommenderMetrics
desc: Metrics you use to evaluate a recommenderâ€™s performance.

items.name: var excludingObserved: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the recommender omitted training data from the recommendations.

items.name: var precisionRecall: MLDataTable
items.desc: A data table with the recall and precision for each item.

items.name: var isValid: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the recommender model was able to calculate metrics.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: The underlying error present when the metrics are invalid.

items.name: init(precisionRecall: MLDataTable, excludingObserved: Bool)
items.desc: Creates metrics for a recommender, given a data table with precision and recall metric columns, and whether the recommender omitted training data.
